ParaDef.Info: Specifies, in seconds, the interval between keep-alive Echo-Request messages towards the same peer. Values-0, 60 to 180. ParamDefault: Default- 60
Specifies, in seconds, the interval between keep-alive Echo-Request messages towards the same peer. Values-1 to 15. ParamDefault: Default- 4
Specifies the retry timeout, in seconds. Values-1 to 20. ParamDefault: Default- 5
